title: recovery tools
extract: 10 Data Recovery Tools You Can Download For Free [Windows]PhotoRec. PhotoRec is a powerful command line recovery tool that can recover your lost data by bypassing the file system, perfect for when your computer can see the drive but cannot access it or for use on a formatted drive. ...
